ZSH Integration Guide

Similarly to the Bash completion functionality also available, ppl comes ready with a ZSH completion function as well. Here’s how to get it set up:

Install the completion function

$ ppl completion zsh | sudo tee /usr/share/zsh/site-functions/

Depending on your choice of operating system, the target directory in the above code may differ. The above is certainly correct for Arch Linux, but on Debian, for example, the target would be /usr/local/share/zsh/site-functions/.
